args.content:
import Mathlib

open Set

/-- Rudin, Principle of Mathematical Analysis exercise 5.17 (statement only).
Suppose f : â„ â†’ â„ is three times continuously differentiable on [-1,1],
with f(-1)=0, f(0)=0, f(1)=1, and f'(0)=0. Then there exists x in (-1,1)
with f^{(3)}(x) â‰¥ 3. -/
theorem Rudin_exercise_5_17 {f : â„ â†’ â„}
  (h : ContDiffOn â„ 3 f (Icc (-1 : â„) (1 : â„)))
  (h_neg1 : f (-1 : â„) = 0)
  (h_0 : f 0 = 0)
  (h_pos1 : f (1 : â„) = 1)
  (h_deriv0 : deriv f 0 = 0) :
  âˆƒ x âˆˆ Ioo (-1 : â„) (1 : â„), deriv (deriv (deriv f)) x â‰¥ 3 := by sorry
